author: Simon Difford
description: The classic 'Natural Daiquiri' with a hint of vanilla.
name: Vanilla Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum (infused with vanilla)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
